column1: #Text=Frieder Gröger was 15 years long teacher until abandoning his job .
#Text=After that he earned a living partly as a district fungus expert .
#Text=Besides he was freelance active , mainly literary .
#Text=Furthermore , he devoted himself to mushroom hunting , the alienation of the grouped goods , flower propagation and selling flowers and onions .
#Text=Gröger significantly designed the Mykologische Mitteilungsblatt Halle , which was distributed to the mushroom surveyors from East Germany .
#Text=Beyond that he actively worked on the fungus-themed journal Boletus , which was later combined with the other journal in the 199ßs under this name unter dem Titel .
#Text=Until he reached the age of 65 he proofreaded , reworked the manuscripts and performed paperwork .
#Text=At this time his membership in the Federal Committee Mycology of the Naturschutzbund Deutschland ( NABU ) .
#Text=From then on he concentrated himself for the development of determination tables .

#Text=First planned as Beiheft zur Zeitschrift für Mykologie , the first part of the 2006 journal Bestimmungsschlüssel für Blätterpilze und Röhrlinge in Europa was released as the 13th volume of the Regensburger Mykologischen Schriften .
#Text=He is member of the Pilzkundlichen Arbeitsgemeinschaft Berlin-Brandenburge .
#Text=with Franz Engel : Pilzwanderungen . Eine Pilzkunde für jedermann . 23rd edition .
#Text=Pilze und Wildfrüchte selbst gesammelt und zubereitet . 3rd edition . Verlag für die Frau , Leipzig 1985 . 144pages . ASINB001C3Q1TS .
